name: LEGO DC Super-Villains: DC TV Series Super Heroes Character Pack
description: A character pack for LEGO DC Super-Villains, introducing characters from DC TV series such as Black Lightning, Supergirl, Flash, Atom, Vibe, and Green Arrow.

name: LEGO DC Super-Villains: Aquaman Bundle Pack
description: Download now to get access to the Aquaman Movie Level Pack 1 & 2! Control your favorite characters based on the DC Aquaman film! Battle as Aquaman and rule the underwater kingdom of Atlantis! Level Packs include Aquaman, Black Manta, Mera, Orm and more.

name: LEGO DC Super-Villains: DC TV Series Super-Villains Character Pack
description: A character pack for LEGO DC Super-Villains, introducing super-villain characters from DC TV series such as Vandal Savage, Vigilante, Zoom, Reign, Indigo, and Prometheus.

name: Pedal to the Metal
description: Race around the track across 9 unique locations to achieve the fastest time on the leaderboard.

name: Bulwark Evolution: Falconeer Chronicles
description: A new city-building game set in the oceanic world of The Great Ursee, by BAFTA-nominated developer Tomas Sala. Design, develop and defend your Bulwark, manage resources and make choices to create unique fortress settlements in a world reeling from a cataclysmic war.

name: Fruit Adventure
description: Help Super Strawberry become the bravest Fruit in the Healthy Forest!

name: War Ashes
description: Sin descripción

name: Lows Adventures
description: Sin descripción

name: Topple Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: Ninja Rabbit
description: Sin descripción

name: Rift of the NecroDancer
description: The NecroDancer's back in a brand new rhythm game spinoff! Help Cadence navigate the modern world while repairing the rifts that have torn her life apart. Do rhythmic battle via rift mode, minigames, and boss battles! All to the beat of a brand new soundtrack from Danny Baranowsky & friends.

name: Fire Emblem: Blessed Heart
description:
- 24 Original Chapters
- 32 Playable Characters
- Branching promotion paths with both new and rebalanced classes
- Map design focused on engaging pacing and side-objectives
- Quality of life features such as viewable growths, promotion information, and more
- Expanded equipment options, including weapons, tomes, and hold items
- Accessible gameplay with difficulty options as well as an optional casual mode
- A few dozen new music tracks ported from other games

name: Fire Emblem: The Four Kings
description: The story centers on three brothers: Walter, Lionel, and Terril. They are the royals of the country of Askia in the land of Ibril. Terril is the current king, and he sends his brothers out on a diplomatic meeting with the king of the western nation of Behanzin. But the brothers constantly argue, and when things get rough, their relationship becomes strained even further…

name: Fire Emblem: Four Kings - Deposition
description: This is Four Kings: Deposition, a short prequel to Four Kings! This story is centered around Daltry, one of the main antagonists of Four Kings, and shows how he began and how he became the man he is in the main story. Of the three main antagonists of Four Kings, I felt that Daltry was the weakest one, since he didn’t receive a lot of screentime or backstory, and his few appearances were kinda generic, so I wanted to remedy that with a new story all about him.

name: Snaccoon
description: Snaccoon is a stealth/exploration game set in a dense, stylized city. The player controls an above-average-intelligence raccoon searching for snack foods after the local city government has banned them. Stumbling across a budding black market of cakes & chips, players will have to steal phones & items to engage in a series of deals that will take them all over the city to trade their way up to a coveted box of their favorite treats.

name: Floodland
description: A society survival game set in a world destroyed by climate change. Explore, scavenge and build a city to unite the clans. Conflicting cultures and limited resources mean you need to make tough choices; have you got what it takes to lead your people into a new era of humanity?

name: Meeblings
description: Help the Meeblings! Use the Meeblings special abilities to rescue as many as possible each level. Explore the Meeblings' world in all 50 fun filled levels.

name: Drift Journey: Nitro
description: Sin descripción

name: Color SlayerS
description: Race and slash your way forward in this color-based arcade game. Put your reflexes to the test and use the Slayers's moves to overcome challenging obstacles and accumulate points.

name: ZJ the Ball Challenge: Level 4C
description: Sin descripción

name: ZJ the Ball Challenge: Level 3C
description: Sin descripción

name: Umami Island
description: Umami Island is an adventure game where the player is stuck on a mysterious island and is trying to find their way back home.

name: Edge of Sanity
description: Set in the unforgiving lands of Alaska, Edge of Sanity is a Lovecraftian survival horror game with unique 2D art, a disturbing story, and complex base management. Gather resources, carefully plan your expeditions and explore the world of madness as you struggle to keep your humanity.

name: The Great War: Western Front
description: The Great War: Western Front is the definitive WW1 strategy game. Play a deciding role in history with this real-time tactical experience as you take charge in the iconic Western Front from 1914 to 1919. Pick your faction and lead your forces to victory.

name: Teslagrad 2
description: Teslagrad 2 is the sequel to the original Teslagrad, developed by Rain Games and released in 2023. This 2D puzzle platformer builds upon the magnetic and electrical mechanics of its predecessor, with players once again using these abilities to solve puzzles and traverse complex environments. Set in a new region, the game introduces new powers, enemies, and challenges, while maintaining the visual storytelling and atmospheric design characteristic of the series.

name: God of Rock
description: God of Rock blends rhythm-based gameplay with fighting game mechanics in tense 1v1 matches. Choose from a dozen unique fighters, each with their own design, mechanics, and harmonic attacks. Soften up your opponent by executing normal moves and building meter by hitting notes to the beat of the song, then spend your meter to unleash EX and special moves do damage and add complexity to their tracks. Finally, finish them off with a devastating Super attack! As the battle progresses, the music track will continue to grow in complexity and difficulty until only one fighter is left standing!

name: Słowica
description: Action story-based game in a Slavic low-fantasy setting.

name: Dehoarder 2
description: Dehoarder 2 is a simulation where you take control of the life of Harry the Hilldale Hoarder. You must help Harry to get his life in order before the building inspector fines him into oblivion and forecloses on the family home. But change comes hard for Harry, and at first he will only be willing to part with the simplest of things.

name: Neighbourhood Cat
description: In the peak of lockdown, you are Neighbourhood Cat, the only one around who still has the freedom to go outside. Roam the streets, visit your neighbours, listen to their stories, and spread a bit of comfort and charm. After all, you are a cat. That's what you do.

name: ZJ the Ball Challenge: Level 2C
description: Sin descripción

name: ZJ the Ball Challenge: Level 1C
description: Sin descripción

name: Carpet Shark
description: Play as the Carpet Shark. Eat as many victims as you can before the timer and your health run out. After each level, fight one of the 4 bosses (our characters from the movie). Try to eat the bosses weapons to fire back at them. Can you beat all 4 levels?

name: Gods of Almagest
description:
Gods of Almagest is a 2d/3d shooter/strategy game, it mix the action of a classic arcade shooter with the strategy of a table game as dots and boxes.

There will be enemies with different shapes but, the area bosses are 10 times bigger than the player spaceship, every boss represent a constellation from the book Almagesto written by Ptolomeo.

name: Halloween Candy Break 2: Head to Head
description: Halloween Candy Break 2 Head to Head is a retro arcade game that lets 1 and 2 players play head to head in a competitive arcade environment. Unique animated Halloween themed items tumble down toward the users paddle along with Mini-Bosses and Powerups. Collect powerups as you progress through the levels and defeat your opponent. Thirty Levels to compete in and battle mini bosses on your way to victory in single player and two player modes.

name: Donut Break 2: Head to Head
description: Donut Break 2 Head to Head is a retro arcade game that lets 1 and 2 players play head to head in a competitive arcade environment. Unique animated Donut themed items tumble down toward the users paddle along with Mini-Bosses and Powerups. Collect powerups as you progress through the levels and defeat your opponent. Thirty Levels to compete in and battle mini bosses on your way to victory in single player and two player modes.

name: Baseball Bout: Otterrific Arcade
description: Sin descripción

name: Oktoberfest Break: Head to Head
description: Oktoberfest Break Head to Head is a retro arcade game that lets 1 and 2 players play head to head in a competitive arcade environment. Unique animated Oktoberfest themed items tumble down toward the users paddle along with Mini-Bosses and Powerups. Collect powerups as you progress through the levels and defeat your opponent. Thirty Levels to compete in and battle mini bosses on your way to victory in single player and two player modes.

name: Plummet Challenge Game
description:
Fista productions is back with a brand new game for your retro entertainment system. You are the Plummeteer. Plunge for prizes and points before hitting obstacles or landing face first into the ground. Gold gems are worth 10 points and the special colored gems are worth 100. There are 75 exciting levels in the main game, while the marathon mode has 150 levels for a longer experience. Everyone is able to complete the game, but just how good are you at it?

The contest awaits.
Can you beat your high score?
Let’s find out.

name: Bard's Gold: Complete Edition
description:
Bard's Gold is a challenging platformer that lets you explore strange worlds in a quest for a Goblin that stole your gold. Help Bard to overcome the dungeon's many dangerous perils and use your new-found treasures to improve your character and to buy new weapons and gear!

Bard’s Gold Complete Edition contains all the hidden Halloween levels in one physical exclusive PS Vita Edition.

name: Come on Kitty
description: Come On Kitty is a game that combines life simulation and puzzles, where you can acquire Kitties by solving puzzles and spending time with them in the Kitty Room.

name: Spartan X
description: Sin descripción

name: The Making of a Prophet
description: A sequel to the controversial title "The You Testament", made by the same developer. Travel back in time to ancient Arabia during the "Days Of Ignorance" and shadow the Prophet Muhammad as he struggles to enlighten his pagan contemporaries. Having been granted a glimpse of the true nature of reality, he beholds mankind to have gone astray and seeks to reunite them with their creator. Follow in his footsteps across 20 unique locations and become his most trusted companion as his destiny gradually unfolds. It doesn't promise to be easy, however, as a disbelieving public and an oppressive Quraysh regime seek to stifle his fledgling movement.

name: The Arm Wrestling Classic
description: You are Barry Biceps. Train your arm to get stronger. Arm Wrestle through the champions of the world and collect your prize money. Take on challengers in the backyard, the parking garage, the bar, the school gym, and the arena. Use the password system to pickup where you left off or to enter secret codes. Go solo with 1 player story mode or invite a friend for 2 player versus.

name: Brick City
description: Play a normal relaxed paced multi-player game Mainly focused on Hanging out with your buds and making your own playable maps!

name: Taco Break: Head to Head
description: Taco Break Head to Head is a retro arcade game that lets 1 and 2 players play head to head in a competitive arcade environment. Unique animated tacos tumble down toward the users paddle along with Mini-Bosses and Powerups. Collect powerups as you progress through the levels and defeat your opponent. Thirty Levels to compete in and battle mini bosses on your way to victory in single player and two player modes.

name: Horror Break: Head to Head
description: Horror Break Head to Head is a retro arcade game that lets 1 and 2 players play head to head in a competitive arcade environment. Unique animated fantasy items tumble down toward the users paddle along with Mini-Bosses and Powerups. Collect powerups as you progress through the levels and defeat your opponent. Thirty Levels to compete in and battle mini bosses on your way to victory in single player and two player modes.

name: Sulkyland
description: Sulkyland is a free game of virtual horse racing. Take part to races, breed and train your horses, manage your stable, your riding school and your racetrack.

name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless
description: The next chapter in the Disgaea saga. In Disgaea 7, the story is set in a world called "Hinomoto Netherworld Cluster," which is inspired by Japanese culture.

name: Alwa's Awakening & Cathedral
description:
In the Alwa's Awakening and Cathedral cartridge for Evercade, you've got two huge exploration-heavy platform adventures ahead of you. Save the land of Alwa as the video game-loving Zoe in Alwa's Awakening, and discover the truth behind an unnamed knight's identity in the mysterious Cathedral.

Cartridge containing the following 2 games:
- Alwa's Awakening: The 8-bit Edition
- Cathedral

name: The C64 Collection 1
description:
THEC64 Collection 1 cartridge for Evercade brings the golden age of '80s home computer games back for another round. Take on the world in thrilling sport action with Summer Games and Winter Games, indulge in some perilous platforming in Jumpman and take on the role of a martial arts master in Lee. Then "stay a while, stay forever" with Impossible Mission and a great selection of other big hits and deep cuts from THEC64's extensive back catalogue!

Cartridge contains the following 14 games:
- Summer Games
- Winter Games
- Impossible Mission
- Jumpman
- Lee
- Gateway to Apshai
- The Movie Monster Game
- Marauder
- Stormlord
- Subterranea
- Iridis Alpha
- Battle Valley
- Alleykat
- Street Sports Baseball

name: Jaleco Arcade 1
description: The Jaleco Arcade 1 cartridge for Evercade features 8 great arcade games from Jaleco’s heyday in the '80s and '90s, including Rod Land, Saint Dragon, E.D.F. Earth Defense Force, Avenging Spirit, 64th Street: A Detective Story, Cybattler, P-47: The Phantom Fighter and The Astyanax

name: Fire Emblem: The Dragon Herald
description: In the continent of Orsia, there exist three nations following a long war: Folga, a northern nation with a focus on magical research, Raudel, an empire that has recently acquired new territory along the Folga/Raudel border, and Verius, a theocracy that generally maintains neutrality in continental conflicts. Verius also serves as the central hub of the dragon faith, the only widespread religion in Orsia. The story follows You, a figure in the dragon faith tasked with delivering the word of the dragons to an annual international summit meant to prevent further war from breaking out.

name: Fire Emblem: Justice & Pride
description:
The continent of Irona. Many years ago, the land was ruled by the forces of darkness. Monsters and dragons alike terrorized the small human populace in Irona. However, one day, a great sage appeared, commanding light and nature, and with the combined might of the sage and her allies, the monsters were sealed using the power of a mysterious tower known as the Spire of Darkness. Following the conflict, the warriors of legend went their own separate ways and founded their own lands, but they all swore fealty to the brother of the great sage, who was crowned Emperor of Irona.

500 years have passed since the time of the Hero of Light. Irona’s Emperor Perseus, a descendant of the first emperor, Hawke, has been acting suspiciously. He and a mysterious mage named Caelia have been reawakening the monsters using the Spire of Darkness. In Norbury, a land on the western end of the continent founded by the master archer Quentin, Duke Robert dies of unknown causes. Tragedy would also strike the duchy of Abrein, a southwestern duchy founded by Bishop Leticia. The son of Duke Simon and descendant of Leticia, Prince Travis, is killed by a surprise ambush by powerful monsters on a scouting mission. This tragic chain of events throws the whole continent into turmoil, pitting the western duchies against the loyalist eastern lands.

11 years after the Great Tragedy, Travis’s younger sister, Princess Aderyn, chooses to fight back. Together with her allies, she strives to save Abrein and to free the rest of the continent from the iron fist of Perseus’s reign.

name: Fire Emblem: Dark Lord and The Maiden of Light
description: The continent of Brauma, named after the dragon goddess, is met with instability. The empire of Deimos, lead by its regent Raum, has launched a campaign of unification. Having defeated its neighbors to the east, Raum turns his eyes southward towards Enterre. Our story begins here, as a young lord from the dukedom Vanheim pays visit to the Duke of Enterre.

name: Monomagia Cantabile
description: Sin descripción

name: Timmy Types
description: Don't swipe - type! Improve your typing speed with this endless runner game.

name: Boomer
description: Help Boomer dash and float through this precision platformer above the clouds. Collect fragments to unlock shrines and rebuild his world. Hand crafted challenges, unlock secrets and piece together an adventure through bright, colorful and an inspiring pixel art alongside an 8-Bit Synth Soundtrack.

name: Captain Tsubasa: Rise of New Champions - Tachibana Brothers Mission
description: The Tachibana brothers are now available as new playable characters in Captain Tsubasa: Rise of New Champions. Clear all 3 DLC story missions to unlock the new ☆ Masao Tachibana and ☆ Kazuo Tachibana.

name: Captain Tsubasa: Rise of New Champions - Juan Diaz Mission
description: Juan Diaz is now available as a new playable character in Captain Tsubasa: Rise of New Champions. Clear all 3 DLC story missions to unlock the new ☆ Juan Diaz.

name: Captain Tsubasa: Rise of New Champions - Tsubasa Ozora Mission
description: Tsubasa Ozora is now available as a new playable character in Captain Tsubasa: Rise of New Champions. Clear all 3 DLC story missions to unlock the new ☆ Tsubasa Ozora.

name: Paddles
description: Compete against friends or robots in local 4-player party chaos! Defend yourself against magical balls in hectic levels to win the prized cup crown.

name: Irem Arcade 1
description: The Irem Arcade 1 cartridge for Evercade features 6 great arcade games from Irem, including early hits Moon Patrol and 10-Yard Fight, the legendary R-Type, the quirky Battle Chopper, the visually stunning In the Hunt and the first ever official home release of Lightning Swords.

name: Aonatsu Line
description: Censored port of the PC release.

name: Seikai no Senki
description: Seikai no Senki is a PC and PlayStation 2 game by Gainax.

name: Seikai no Monshou
description: Seikai no Monshou is a Role-Playing game, developed by NineLives and published by Bandai, which was released in Japan in 2000.

name: Yerevan Drive
description: Yerevan Drive is the first Armenian 3D game. The objective is to rally in the streets of Yerevan. The menu and the soundtrack are in Armenian. The game also includes a subway.

name: Date ni Game Tsui Wake Jane! Dungeon Maker Girls Type
description: Date ni Game Tsui Wake Jane! Dungeon Maker Girls Type is a Role-Playing game, developed by Global A and published by Idea Factory, which was released in Japan in 2009.

name: Otometeki Koi Kakumei Love Revo!! DS
description: A port of Otometeki Koi Kakumei Love Revo for the Nintendo DS.

name: GameBreak
description: GameBreak is a local multiplayer Mini Game Collection. That requires 2 Players to play.

name: Doodle Fit Hell-O-Ween
description: Doodle Fit Hell-O-Ween - A scary special edition of App Store's favorite Doodle-style puzzler!

name: Matchday Football Manager Game
description:
Become a football manager. Assemble a squad of football superstars and climb to the top of the soccer manager world.
This is a new and fresh football manager game. This is a football management game unlike any other.
Take charge of your own club built around you. Play matches when YOU want. Test your football manager credentials against players from around the world in exclusive live competitions.

name: Desert Journey
description: Join this Desert Journey thorough the desert in the car. Enjoy the graphics with the best tunes.

name: Paddles
description: Simple yet difficult to master, Paddles is perfect as a pick up and go party game to play with your friends anytime, anywhere!

name: Sonic Frontiers: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Worlds are colliding in Sonic the Hedgehog’s newest high-speed adventure! In search of the missing Chaos emeralds, Sonic becomes stranded on an ancient island teeming with unusual creatures. Battle hordes of powerful enemies as you explore a breathtaking world of action, adventure, and mystery. Accelerate to new heights and experience the thrill of high-velocity, open-zone platforming freedom as you race across the five massive Starfall Islands. Jump into adventure, wield the power of the Ancients, and fight to stop these new mysterious foes. Welcome to the evolution of Sonic games! Experience All-New Open Zone Platforming Race across five massive overworld islands brimming with dense forests, overflowing waterfalls, and sizzling desert landscapes, each with their own unique action-platforming challenges and hidden secrets to uncover. Unparalleled High-Speed FreedomAdventure across the Starfall Islands and see what each has to offer at the speed that only Sonic can deliver. Blaze a trail as you see fit and discover side quests, solve puzzles, scale enormous structures, go fishing, and encounter a friendly face or two along the way… Challenge Yourself In Cyber SpaceDiscover portals scattered across the island and venture into Cyber Space levels through portals scattered across the islands featuring signature 3D platforming at Sonic speeds, packed with challenges to put your skills to the test. Cyber-Powered CombatThe Starfall Islands are home to strange creatures Sonic has never encountered before. Use the all-new battle system and skill tree upgrades to fight strategically, combining moves such as dodges, parries, counters, combos, and the new Cyloop ability to take down mysterious foes and colossal titans. A New Adventure Full of Mystery and IntrigueBecome Sonic and journey to uncover the mysteries of the remains of an ancient civilization plagued by robotic hordes. With nothing but a handful of questions and a disembodied voice to guide you, set out to save your friends and the enigmatic inhabitants of the Starfall Islands from a colossal, mechanized threat.

name: Otometeki Koi Kakumei Love Revo! Portable
description: Otometeki Koi Kakumei * Love Revo! Portable is an otome game, developed by HuneX and published by Idea Factory, which was released in Japan in 2010.

name: 2weistein: The Curse of the Red Dragon 3 - Ronger Pirates
description: A new episode, following "2weistein in Asban" and "2weistein - The Lost Wood".

name: Otometeki Koi Kakumei Love Revo!! 100kg Kara Hajimaru Koi Monogatari
description: Remake of the original Otometeki Koi Kakumei Love Revo!! game.

name: Florealia
description: A chance meeting with the divine, human in shape but not in thoughts.

name: Okubi
description:
Okubi is a multi-battleground Player-versus-player game where you incarnate a corrupted creature armed to the teeth.
Absorb all sources of life, upgrade your gear and join the ranks in unique, fast-paced and explosive adventures.
Learn new abilities, gather resources to forge powerful items and collect epic rewards to enhance your character. Combine ground and aerial abilities in merciless 20-minutes battlegrounds.

name: Back to the Joseon
description: Sword action game using physics collision

name: Donut Break: Head to Head
description: Donut Break Head to Head is a retro arcade game that lets 1 and 2 players play head to head in a competitive arcade environment. Unique animated pastries tumble down toward the users paddle along with Mini-Bosses and Powerups. Collect donut powerups as you progress through the levels and defeat your opponent.

description: Valentine Candy Break Head to Head is a retro arcade game that lets 1 and 2 players play head to head in a competitive arcade environment. name: Kaitou Rousseau
description: In Kaitou Rousseau (aka. Rousseau the Thief), you take the role as a thief who is trying to hide from the police. Rousseau has one very tricky ability, which is to change the shape and look of his face. By drawing images on the Nintendo DS touch screen, you can adapt Rousseau to the current surroundings and thereby evade his chasers. For example, you can draw a picture of a girl to throw off the cops when in a crowd or quickly sketch what's on a nearby wall to blend in with the background.

name: Beautiful Escape: Dungeoneer
description: Beautiful Escape: Dungeoneer is a short game about torture and love.
